philipm.cs5.software.development.server.system

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • philipm.cs5.software.development.server.system.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class stores the server that enables communication with any number of clients.
    Author:
    mortimer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(java.lang.String[] errorMessArray)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor method initialises appropriate constants and values.
        Parameters:
        errorMessArray - The array which stores the error messages. This error should be of length zero but will be set to length zero regardless.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an error occurred, an exception is throw. This exception contains a String message that can be displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • getClubContactDataFromFile

        private java.lang.String[] getClubContactDataFromFile()
        Gets the club contact details from file
        Returns:
        The contact details

      • addGuestIdToFilesIfAppropriate

        private void addGuestIdToFilesIfAppropriate()
        This method is used to add the guest id to the user file. This method is no longer used as Guest records are not stored. This has been kept to make the code maintainable and easy to expand.

      • loadFileToArray

        private java.lang.String[][] loadFileToArray(int widthOfFile,
                                             java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads a text file and converts into a 2d array.
        Parameters:
        widthOfFile - The number of fields in the file
        fileName - The fileName
        Returns:
        The array that represents the data stored in the file

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread runs and creates a new thread for every client communication. This allows for any number of clients to communicate with the server simultaneously.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • writeArrayToFileWithSplit

        public void writeArrayToFileWithSplit(java.lang.String[][] array,
                                      java.lang.String fileName)
        Writes the array to the specified text file, with each field being split with an appropriate character.
        Parameters:
        array - The 2d string array
        fileName - The file name

      • closeServerSocket

        public void closeServerSocket()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the server socket and stops the thread
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An IOException may occur

      • haveAnyErrorsOccured

        public boolean haveAnyErrorsOccured()
        Checks to see if any error have occurred in the program
        Returns:
        True is returned if the error messages array length is not equal to one. Otherwise false is returned

      • getErrorMessages

        public java.lang.String[] getErrorMessages()
        Gets all error messages.
        Returns:
        The error message. Each element in the array represents an error message.

      • addErrorToErrorMessages

        private void addErrorToErrorMessages(java.lang.String newError)
        Adds a new error message to the array that stores all error messages. Also sets the variable hasErrorOccuredToTrue
        Parameters:
        newError - the new error message to be appended
